name: Blue Toad Murder Files: Ep 2-6 Upgrade
name_original: Blue Toad Murder Files: Ep 2-6 Upgrade
description:
A murder mystery puzzle adventure from the developers of Buzz!™. If you already own episode 1, upgrade to the full season of Blue Toad Murder Files for a special discounted price!

Now supports the PlayStation®Move motion controller!

Set in the quaint village of Little Riddle, you play as one of the four members of the Blue Toad Detective Agency. Can you follow the clues and find the murderer? With each step of the investigation a puzzle is played and further clues about the case are revealed. Pay attention to what transpires – you will regularly be questioned on your knowledge of the case, and only observant detectives will learn the truth behind the events of the day.

Blue Toad Murder Files™: The Mysteries of Little Riddle has 6 episodes each with a new crime and suspects to be uncovered. The series has over 90 challenging puzzles, Case Reviews and Whodunnits.

This product supports the following languages: In-game speech: English; On-screen text: English.
